item.description:
HEY, ITS THE PATRIOTS, BABY! Gotta root them on! Next stop: Superbowl?!

Avoid travel in the snow! Join us once again at Four Green Fields pub smack in the heart of Boston to cheer on the Pats! It's "the biggest screen in Boston at the longest bar in Boston".

Last time was a PARTY!

Four Green Fields has a huge 20 Foot screen and a 300 plus crowd capacity. Other places will be loud for this game, but this pub is new and we should be able to meetup (talk!) as well as watch the game.

http://fourgreenfields.com/homepage.php

This meetup will be cross-posted to Social Fun, Boston Happy Hour, & Red Sox Natives.

We are getting to the pub early to get in some pre-game socializing and to make sure and get good seats (management says there will be a "designated area" near the front)!

Nearest T stop is State, on the Blue and Orange lines. Parking is available at the Pi Alley Garage on Washington St.

From State T station, go to the corner of Washington St. on Court St. just past the Old Court House. The front of 1 Boston Place is a bank. Go around to the back of this building, on the left to get to the pub.

The service was great last time. Please maintain your own tab and don't forget TA TIP YAH SERVER!
item.name: New England Patriots AFC Championship Playoff Game-- 20 Foot Screen
